    • Uses of WeightInitialization in edu.packt.neuralnet.init

      Subclasses of WeightInitialization in edu.packt.neuralnet.init 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GaussianInitialization
      This class extends WeightInitialization class and it uses values produced by Guassian distribution to initialize neural net weights
      class  UniformInitialization
      This class extends WeightInitialization class and it uses uniform values to initialize neural net weights
      class  ZeroInitialization
      This class extends WeightInitialization class and it initializes neural net weights with zeros
